H0.text: Sex hormones serve many functions in addition to promoting gamete production.

H1.text: Multifaceted hormones serve many functions in addition to promoting gamete production.

H2.text: Reflection hormones serve many functions in addition to promoting gamete production.

H3.text: Utility hormones serve many functions in addition to promoting gamete production.

A4.text: Synthetic estrogens and progestins are used in methods of hormonal contraception.

A5.text: Sex hormones interact with vertebrate steroid hormone receptors.
